description.zh-cn: 香港男演员、舞蹈员，现为无线电视部头合约艺员。
description.en: Hong Kong male actor and dancer, currently a contract artist with Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB).

description.zh-cn: 胡枫的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家主要的电视台。
description.en: A major television broadcasting company in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲电视的前身，香港第一家电视台。
description.en: The predecessor of Asia Television (ATV), it was the first television station in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影公司，胡枫于1953年加入该公司开始其电影生涯。
description.en: A Hong Kong film company which Bowie Woo joined in 1953 to start his film career.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，与胡枫为情同兄妹的挚友。
description.en: Hong Kong actress, a close friend of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，与胡枫、曾江、Joe Junior共同主持旅游节目《4个小生去旅行》。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, co-hosted the travel show '4 Amigos Bon Voyage' with Bowie Woo, Kenneth Tsang, and Joe Junior.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，与胡枫、谢贤、Joe Junior共同主持旅游节目《4个小生去旅行》。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, co-hosted the travel show '4 Amigos Bon Voyage' with Bowie Woo, Patrick Tse, and Joe Junior.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，与胡枫、谢贤、曾江共同主持旅游节目。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, co-hosted a travel show with Bowie Woo, Patrick Tse, and Kenneth Tsang.

description.zh-cn: 已故香港武打演员，曾接受胡枫的演技指导。
description.en: Late Hong Kong martial arts actor, who received acting guidance from Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港武打演员，曾接受胡枫的演技指导。
description.en: Hong Kong martial arts actor, who received acting guidance from Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，胡枫的谊子。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, godson of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，胡枫的谊子。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, godson of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手，胡枫的谊女。
description.en: Hong Kong singer, goddaughter of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物及前演员，胡枫的契女。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and former actress, goddaughter of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 1953年的电影，是胡枫的出道作及成名作。
description.en: A 1953 film that was Bowie Woo's debut and breakthrough role.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，在1960年代后期与胡枫合作过多部歌舞片。
description.en: Hong Kong actress who co-starred with Bowie Woo in numerous song-and-dance films in the late 1960s.

description.zh-cn: 香港粤剧演员和电影演员，与胡枫合作其出道作《男人心》。
description.en: Hong Kong Cantonese opera and film actress who co-starred with Bowie Woo in his debut film 'A Man's Heart'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影界的年度颁奖典礼，该届向胡枫颁发了终身成就奖。
description.en: The annual awards ceremony for the Hong Kong film industry, where Bowie Woo was presented with the Lifetime Achievement Award.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员、歌手及主持人。
description.en: Hong Kong actress, singer, and host.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫与吕咏荷于1957年结婚，直至吕咏荷2016年病逝。
description.en: Bowie Woo and Lui Wing Ho were married in 1957 until her death in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫曾于1973年至1977年及1988年至今两度为无线电视艺员。
description.en: Bowie Woo has been an artist for TVB during two periods: from 1973 to 1977, and from 1988 to the present.

description.zh-cn: 在1970年代中至1987年间，胡枫曾于丽的电视（亚洲电视前身）工作。
description.en: From the mid-1970s until 1987, Bowie Woo worked at Rediffusion Television (predecessor to ATV).

description.zh-cn: 胡枫于1953年考入大成影片公司，并开始其电影生涯。
description.en: Bowie Woo joined Tai Seng Film Company in 1953, beginning his film career.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫于1952年毕业于香港培英中学。
description.en: Bowie Woo graduated from Pui Ying Secondary School in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫于1932年1月18日出生于广州市的广州医学院第三附属医院。
description.en: Bowie Woo was born on January 18, 1932, at The Third Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University in Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 自2019年起，胡枫和罗兰常在影视剧中扮演夫妻，在现实生活中是情同兄妹的挚友。
description.en: Since 2019, Bowie Woo and Helena Law have often played couples in film and television, and are close friends in real life, like brother and sister.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫与谢贤是多年好友，并曾共同主持旅游节目《4个小生去旅行》。尽管2015年发生过谢贤掌掴曾江并误中胡枫的宣传事件，但他们依然是好友。
description.en: Bowie Woo and Patrick Tse are long-time friends and co-hosted the travel show '4 Amigos Bon Voyage'. Despite a 2015 publicity stunt where Tse slapped Kenneth Tsang and accidentally hit Woo, they remain good friends.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫与曾江是好友，并曾共同主持旅游节目《4个小生去旅行》。
description.en: Bowie Woo and Kenneth Tsang are friends and co-hosted the travel show '4 Amigos Bon Voyage'.

description.zh-cn: 谢贤与曾江是多年好友。2015年在《4个小生去旅行》记者会上发生的掌掴事件后被证实为节目宣传技俩。
description.en: Patrick Tse and Kenneth Tsang are long-time friends. The slapping incident at the '4 Amigos Bon Voyage' press conference in 2015 was later confirmed to be a publicity stunt for the show.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫与Joe Junior曾共同主持旅游节目。
description.en: Bowie Woo and Joe Junior have co-hosted travel shows together.

description.zh-cn: 1960年代后期，胡枫与萧芳芳合作过不少歌舞片。
description.en: In the late 1960s, Bowie Woo and Josephine Siao collaborated on many song-and-dance films.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫的出道作《男人心》是与当红女星芳艳芬搭档。
description.en: Bowie Woo's debut film, 'A Man's Heart', co-starred the famous actress Fong Yim Fun.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫曾是李小龙的演技导师。
description.en: Bowie Woo was an acting coach for Bruce Lee.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫曾是成龙的演技导师。
description.en: Bowie Woo was an acting coach for Jackie Chan.

description.zh-cn: 张学友是胡枫的谊子，在拍摄电影《猛鬼学堂》时上契。
description.en: Jacky Cheung is the godson of Bowie Woo. The godfather-godson relationship was formally acknowledged during the filming of 'The Haunted Cop Shop'.

description.zh-cn: 黎明是胡枫的谊子，在1989年拍摄电影《四千金》时上契。
description.en: Leon Lai is the godson of Bowie Woo. The godfather-godson relationship was formally acknowledged in 1989 during the filming of 'Four Loves'.

description.zh-cn: 林忆莲是胡枫的谊女，在拍摄电影《猛鬼学堂》时上契。
description.en: Sandy Lam is the goddaughter of Bowie Woo. The goddaughter-godfather relationship was formally acknowledged during the filming of 'The Haunted Cop Shop'.

description.zh-cn: 方国珊是胡枫的契女。
description.en: Christine Fong is the goddaughter of Bowie Woo.

description.zh-cn: 电影《男人心》是胡枫的出道作，令他一夜成名。
description.en: The film 'A Man's Heart' was Bowie Woo's debut and made him famous overnight.

description.zh-cn: 在第41届香港电影金像奖颁奖典礼上，胡枫获颁终身成就奖。
description.en: At the 41st Hong Kong Film Awards, Bowie Woo was presented with the Lifetime Achievement Award.

description.zh-cn: 薛家燕在第41届香港电影金像奖上为胡枫颁发终身成就奖。
description.en: Nancy Sit presented the Lifetime Achievement Award to Bowie Woo at the 41st Hong Kong Film Awards.
